## Row

```{r}
#| title: バランスチェック
table <- cobalt::bal.tab(
  ethnicity ~ gender + call + city + college,
  ResumeNames
)

cobalt::love.plot(table)
```

```{r}
#| title: 平均効果

Y <- if_else(ResumeNames$call == "yes",1,0)

model <- estimatr::lm_robust(
  Y ~ ethnicity,
  ResumeNames
)

model_long <- estimatr::lm_robust(
  Y ~ ethnicity + gender + college ,
  ResumeNames
)

dotwhisker::dwplot(
  list(model,model_long),
  vars_order = "ethnicityafam")
# alt + ctr + i
```
